attributes.action: Create a new Bank Holiday in honour of NHS workers and all emergency staff
attributes.additional_details: Because as a society we often forget how important NHS workers are.
attributes.background: Honour emergency workers with a new bank holiday to show our respect and thanks for all they do and have done with coronavirus

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign these petitions calling for the same action:

https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/307364
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/303882

You can find out more about coronavirus and how you can protect yourself and others here:

NHS website: https://www.nhs.uk/conditions/coronavirus-covid-19/
UK Government website: https://www.gov.uk/coronavirus

You can read NHS tips to help if you are worried about coronavirus here: https://www.nhs.uk/oneyou/every-mind-matters/coronavirus-covid-19-anxiety-tips
